models.name: todo_list_users
models.description: Authentication and identity table for all application users. Holds essential user credentials, identification, and minimal auditing information. Used for user registration, login, and ownership association with {@link todo_list_todos} (in other component). Each user record is uniquely identified by email and manages its own password. Deletion or modification of user accounts is audited via timestamps. Email uniqueness enforces single identity. No advanced roles exist; this is the only actor type in the system. No PII beyond minimal required for authentication is stored. This table does not directly reference any business data tables, but is referenced by them for ownership.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique user email address for identification and login. Must be unique; serves as user identity within the service.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Secure hash of the user password (never stores plaintext password). Used for login verification only. Application must enforce proper hashing algorithms.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created (registration time). Used for auditing and account lifecycle tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent profile or credential update for auditing and compliance.

plainFields.name: last_login
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the user's most recent successful login. Used for security, analytics, and notification of suspicious activity.

models.name: todo_list_todos
models.description: Represents a single task in the user's todo list. Each todo item belongs to exactly one user, and all CRUD operations are scoped to the owner. Fields include required title (100 char max), optional description (500 char max), completed status, timestamps for creation, last update, and completion. Enforces strict user ownership via foreign key to {@link todo_list_users.id}. Supports efficient retrieval by user and order of creation.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_user_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged user's {@link todo_list_users.id}. Enforces per-user ownership of each todo.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Concise summary of the task. Required. 1-100 characters; validated by application upon CRUD operations.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the task. Maximum 500 characters; may be null if not provided.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Whether the todo is currently marked as complete or not. Default is false upon creation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of when the todo was created. Used for audit and list ordering.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the todo (including completion toggle/edit).

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo was marked completed. Null if not completed.
